title: Mass Murders
description: 12 midnight at Metro Manila.Try to remain calm if you suddenly spot a tikbalang speeding down EDSA or a manananggal swooping across the Makati skyline. While partying at the Fort, never ever let the enkanto at the bar buy you a drink.Yet, there are deadlier things than walk the streets of this city.One of them now demands blood and sacrifice.When crime takes a turn for a weird, the police call Trese.
author: Budjette Tan
